case.name: Aunt Bethesda
case.short_description: Aunt Bethesda was killed on the 31st of December 2025 by one of her closest assistant

parties.name: William Danials
parties.description:
Estate Manager
Looks like Euan Ripper (confirmed to be the same person)

timelines.name: Aunt found dead
timelines.description: The Aunt Bethesda is found dead in her house

timelines.name: Argument with Tongyu
timelines.description: The nights before the murder, Tongyu and the aunt had a big argument

timelines.name: Tea with Herby
timelines.description: The night of the murder, Herby and the aunt shared a cup of tea

timelines.name: Kacper's letter
timelines.description: A couple days after the event, Jane found a letter from Kacper in Aunt's office. He was begging her to give him a job as a cook, regardless of the wages and hours she requires as he heard she was a woman who values second chances.

timelines.name: Death of Aunt Augusta
timelines.description: Aunt Augusta died in the Hospital and 2 hours 48 minutes after her admission

theories.name: Amnesia
theories.content: Renran forget she was the murderer and became a detective
